head.title: Bush and Europeans Disagree on Warming

hedline.hl1: Bush and Europeans Disagree on Warming

block.p: LEAD: President Bush today called for more research on the issue of global warming induced by pollution, but officials from several European nations responded that research was not enough and that prompt, concrete action was needed as well.
